text: Nocardioides fonticola is a Gram-positive and rod-shaped bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from a freshwater spring in Kaohsiung on Taiwan. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides fonticola at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * fonticola Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardioides fonticola
